ai_operations.reasoning: No merge operations were performed as each cluster represents a distinct client project or a unique internal initiative, failing the 'Same project' rule for merging. All clusters with more than 25 messages (clusters 001-005) were identified for splitting. The splits are based on the distinct sub-topics and project phases clearly indicated in the cluster titles and sample messages, such as planning, legal review, and creative development. This strategy transforms the initial 6 clusters into 14 more granular and topically-focused clusters, aligning with the target of 12-15 final clusters.
